tldr: Affected versions contain a use-after-free vulnerability caused by improper class destruction during module shutdown. Specifically, child classes reference parent class structures that are freed earlier in the `clean_module_classes()` function, leading to heap-use-after-free conditions.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `php-fpm` library to a patch version.
